meta.description: Determine the number of seasonal and permanent snow removers to hire to minimize the total number of workers while meeting labor hours and budget constraints.

sets.name: WORKER_TYPES
sets.description: Types of snow removers employed by the city.

params.name: hours_per_shift
params.description: Number of hours each type of worker works per shift.

params.name: cost_per_shift
params.description: Cost of hiring each type of worker per shift.

params.name: required_hours
params.description: Total hours of snow remover labor needed.

params.name: budget
params.description: Total budget available for hiring snow removers.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of workers to hire of each type.

objective.name: min_total_workers
objective.description: Minimize the total number of snow removers hired.

constraints.name: labor_hours_requirement
constraints.description: Ensure the total labor hours meet the required hours.

constraints.name: budget_constraint
constraints.description: Ensure the total cost does not exceed the budget.
